snippet.title: Despondent Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Despondent on Steam!
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3109070/Despondent/

Despondent is a first-person survival horror title. Play as Sedgewick, a young man tossed into a hellish fight for his life while trying to pick up the pieces of his past. Manage a debilitating sickness, hold on to what little hope is left, uncover a rancid plot and just maybe... make it out alive.

To learn more about Despondent find me on twitter, thankyou heaps for your support guys! :)
-- https://x.com/laterskatergame

#horrorgaming #indiegame #despondent
